competitive_intel:
## Available Competitive Intelligence

- Competition description: `../research/description.md`
- 5 top kernel notebooks in `../research/kernels/`

data_findings.finding: Key feature engineering for Titanic: FamilySize = SibSp + Parch + 1, IsAlone (1 if FamilySize==1), Title extracted from Name, AgeBin (binned age), FareBin (binned fare), Has_Cabin indicator, Name_length
Stacking ensemble approach: Use 5 base models (RandomForest, ExtraTrees, AdaBoost, GradientBoosting, SVC) with out-of-fold predictions, then use XGBoost as second-level meta-classifier
